title: Static
description: A princess locked in a tower. A prince to save her.You’ve heard the tale, but not like this.Olena, Second Princess of the Fifth Kingdom, has been trapped in the tower vault ever since the Great Disaster destroyed her world years ago. She waits—alone—tending to her makeshift garden and listening to the maddening static of the radio. That was until Ethan’s voice crackled across the speaker, reigniting the embers of hope.As her mysterious new companion journeys to the tower, Olena recounts the death of her Kingdom, weaving a tale of wedding plans, secret weapons, sibling rivalries, personal loss, and royal conspiracies that have deeper repercussions than she ever realized; repercussions that may keep her locked away forever.
author: Dennis Demetrio
